values: A hook is a sharp curved piece of metal used for catching or holding things.
The fish went after the sharp hook.

钩， 吊钩； 钩状物
To hook is to catch or entangle something with a hook.
A hook is a curved piece of metal or other material used for catching, holding, or hanging things.
n. 挂钩，吊钩,vt. 钩住；引上钩,vi. 钩住；弯成钩状
